title: [SNES 9x Emulator][PS3][3K3y]
description:
This Super Nintendo emulator is amazing. It is set up to run on an OFW PS3 with the 3K3y in decrypted ISO format but it will run with CFW as well with or without the 3K3y. It might need some tweaking if you want to run it on CFW. This emulator lets you save like you would normally on the original console. If you want to add or delete games from this ISO, just extract with WinRAR, go into  PS3_GAME/USRDIR/, add or delete the roms and create ISO with ISO Tools. Just make sure output is decrypted ISO for OFW and encrypted ISO for CFW.

To load rom, go down to dvd_bdvd/PS3_GAME/USRDIR/ then click "X" to load the rom. It comes with 236 of the most popular games for the system including: 

Castlevania: Dracula X
Chrono Trigger
Donkey Kong Country
Donkey Kong Country 2
Donkey Kong Country 3
Earthworm Jim
Earthworm Jim 2
Final Fantasy I
Final Fantasy II
Final Fantasy III
Final Fantasy IV
Killer Instinct
Legend Of Zelda: A Link To The Past
Mega Man X
Mega Man X 2
Mega Man X 3 
Mortal Kombat
Mortal Kombat 2
Mortal Kombat 3
NBA Jam
Secret Of Mana
Super Castlevania IV
Super Mario All-Stars
Super Mario Kart
Super Mario RPG: Legend Of The Seven Stars
Super Mario World
Super Metroid
Star Fox
